scripts.nuke: pnpm nuke:shared && pnpm nuke:apps && pnpm nuke:lockfile
scripts.nuke:shared: for d in shared/*/node_modules shared/*/*/node_modules shared/*/*/*/node_modules shared/*/dist shared/*/*/dist shared/*/*/*/dist shared/*/.turbo shared/*/*/.turbo shared/*/*/*/.turbo; do if [ -d $d ]; then echo $d; rm -rf $d; fi; done
scripts.nuke:apps: rm -rf node_modules .next .turbo storybook-static .vercel; for d in apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/.turbo apps/*/storybook-static apps/*/.vercel; do if [ -d $d ]; then echo $d; rm -rf $d; fi; done
